simpleAccount.controller

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpleAccount.controller.AbstractController
      • simpleAccount.controller.AccountController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class AccountController
extends AbstractController
    This is the main AccountController for both the accounting and main views. This contains the operations they perform.
    Since:
    2015-04-05
    Author:
    Paul Bryson

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountController

        public AccountController()
        AccountController Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • operation

        public void operation(java.lang.String option,
                      java.lang.String id)
        This is the main operation operation() from the main account view. This is a list of actions the user can select from.
        Parameters:
        option - the user's selection
        id - the user's ID

      • operationTransfer

        public void operationTransfer(java.lang.String id,
                              java.lang.String currency,
                              java.lang.Double amount)
        This is the account operation operationTransfer() from the edit currency view. This is a list of the actions the user can select from.
        Parameters:
        id - the user's ID
        currency - the currency in which the user is editing in
        amount - the amount the user would like to deposit/withdraw

      • SetAgent

        public void SetAgent(java.lang.String accountID,
                     double amount,
                     double ops,
                     java.lang.String agentID,
                     java.lang.Boolean agentRunning,
                     java.lang.String agentStatus)
        The SetAgent() function is what sets the agents to get everything running.
        Parameters:
        accountID - the selected account ID
        amount - the amount of money that is being withdrawn/deposited
        ops - the operation
        agentID - the agentID that is running
        agentRunning - if the agent is running
        agentStatus - the status of the agent

      • ReadFile

        public boolean ReadFile(java.lang.String file)
        This is the ReadFile() function that is called to read in the text file that the system is interacting with. The file contains an account number, a user name, and a total.
        Parameters:
        file - location of the file
        Returns:
        boolean if the read was successful

      • WriteFile

        public boolean WriteFile()
        This is the WriteFile() function that writes back out the data the user has been interacting with. It contains all changes that were made to the account balances.
        Returns:
        boolean if the write was successful
